headline: Wastewater Treatment Services Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Veolia, SUEZ, and Xylem Lead with Sustainable Solutions, Digital Innovation, and Expanded Portfolios
summary: The Wastewater Treatment Services Companies Quadrant provides an in-depth analysis of the global wastewater treatment market, highlighting key players, innovations, and trends. The 360 Quadrants review over 62 companies, with the top 8 being honored as leaders. Wastewater treatment services aim to purify water from industrial and municipal sources, removing pollutants to meet regulatory standards. headline: Pump Industry Research Report 2025-2030 | Record Infrastructure Investments, Oil & Gas Demand, EV Expansion, and Rising Water & Food Industry Needs Fueling Expansion
summary: The global pump market is projected to grow at a CAGR of 4.69% between 2024 and 2030, driven by infrastructure projects, oil exploration, and the rise in the EV segment. Trade tensions between the U.S. and China are influencing price hikes and supply chain disruptions, with pump manufacturers like Flowserve and Xylem diversifying sourcing. Key pump market trends include the adoption of energy-efficient technologies and digitalization, while restraints center on high costs and quality inconsisten
